K-Rise Systems EASYProcess Tabs Manager (ETM).
A tool to help developers of EASYProcess applications manage their application tabs in the browser.
This is an internal tool to be used on any tenant.
When the extension is in use, opening any tabs related to the application will show a hierarchical list of the tabs and what applications they belong to, to make it easier to manage multiple pages and navigate the application.
